sentence.idiomatic: I've never been yelled at by my mom.
My diary has been read.
Have you been notified to go to the meeting?
I value the quality of life.
You should pay close attention to others' opinions.
The government pays close attention to rural development.
Trendy things aren't always the best.
A lot of young people like wearing trendy clothes.
Ms. Li is more fashionable than Ms. Wang. Ms. Wang isn't fashionable at all.
You can get cheap and beautiful accessories from the market.
Bags are an accessory. Skirts aren't.
The accessories on her look very special.
If you pay cash, you can get a discount.
Can you give me a discount?
What is the discount on this pair of shoes?
The way she dresses is very stylish.
We have different taste in movies.
He has a very bad taste.
Peking University is very famous all over the world.
Is he well-known? How come I've never heard of him?
Lili is famous in the company for her beauty.

Shanghai is often called ‘the Paris of the East’.Because the Shanghainese people, and especially the Shanghainese women, pay close attention to their appearance.There are many department stores in Shanghai.Shanghainese women can buy the trendiest clothes.Many women spend a lot of money buying clothes and accessories.When department stores have a sale, there are often people lined up outside
